titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from $60 to $75 the maximun amount of monthly pension that may be paid to a veteran being furnished hospital, nursing home, or domiciliary care by the Veterans' Administration.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/18/1987--Introduced. Increases from $60 to $75 the maximum monthly pension payable to a veteran being furnished hospital, nursing home, or domiciliary care by the Veterans Administration.
